title: Chris Rock’s Response, Comics React and Josh Wolf
description:
Comedian Josh Wolf and Heather talk about when Josh wrote on Jada and Will Smith’s show which is very juicy. Heather shares when she was unexpectedly slapped on TV. Does an open marriage ever really work? Heather predicts what Will will do next and if they will stay married. we explore why stand-up comics are the most vulnerable of all artists. We’re Oscar jokes stolen from Twitter. Hilaria Baldwin is pregnant again. Heather is into cloning. Britney’s latest post makes the least amount of sense yet. 

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free

Or get access to Extra Juicy on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/juicyscoop
